INTERACTIONS_KA: ကသံၣ်မၤတၢ်ကဒဲကဒဲ

DESCRIPTION_EN: Anti-viral: to treat Herpes Virus Diseases (Herpes Simplex, Herpes Zoster).
NOTE_EN:
Treatment need to be started very soon after the symptoms. 
 If started later than 24 hours in Varicella or 72 hours in Herpes Zoster, the 
 treatment does not work: do not give
FOOD_EN: Can be taken with or without food.
BE_CAREFUL_EN:
High doses (800 mg 5 times a day) can give confusion and hallucinations:
 you need to let the patient know.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Tirenedess, headache, rash, nausea, diarrhoea, vomiting.
INTERACTIONS_EN:
If given together with Cotrimoxazole, Diclofenac, Gentamicin, 
 Ibuprofen, Indomethacin, Meloxicam: increased risk of kidney 
 toxicity.
DO_NOT_GIVE_KA: ကလ့ၢ်တၢ်ဆါ၊ တၢ်ထံသံးနိသံးလၢအအိၣ်၊ ဒီး (Theophylline) ။
INTERACTIONS_KA:
နမ့ၢ်ဟ့ၣ်ဃုာ်တွဲဃုာ်ဒီးကသံၣ် (Cotrimoxazole), (Diclofenac),
 (Gentamicin), (Ibuprofen), (Indomethacin), (Meloxicam) တဖၣ်အံၤန့ၣ်ကမၤဘၣ်ဒိအါထီၣ်၀ဲကလ့ၢ်တၢ်စုၣ်တၢ်ပျၢ်တဖၣ်လီၤ။

DESCRIPTION_KA: ကသံၣ်ကူစါတၢ်အဆါဒီးတၢ်ညီး။
FOOD_EN: Take with food or full glass of water to decrease stomach upset.
BE_CAREFUL_EN:
Asthma, allergy, dehydration, gastric pain, G6PD deficiency, 
 old people.
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: Gastric ulcer, Dengue Fever, children less than 16 years.
INTERACTIONS_EN:
- Aspirin increases effect of Phenytoin. 
 - Prednisolone and Dexamethasone increase risk of stomach and 
 intestinal bleeding).
 - Aspirin decreases effect of Spironolactone.
PREGANCY_EN: Do not give last month of pregnancy.
SIDE_EFFECTS_KA: ကဖုဆါ၊ကသါဃံး၊ (ဘြိခိၤစဖၤ)။
INTERACTIONS_KA:
- (Aspirin) မၤအါထီၣ်ကသံၣ (Phenytoin) အသဟီၣ်။ -(Prednisolone) ဒီး (Dexamethasone) န့ၣ်မၤအါထီၣ်၀ဲတၢ်ကီတၢ်ခဲ
 လၢသွံၣ်ယွၤလၢကဖုဒီးၦံာ်ပူၤသ့လီၤ။ - (Aspirin) မၤလီၤစှၤကသံၣ (Spironolactone) အသဟီၣ်နၣ့်လီၤ။
PREGANCY_KA: တဘၣ်ဟ့ၣ်ၦၤမိၢ်ဒၢအလီၢ်ခံကတၢၢ်တလါဘၣ်။

DOSAGE_EN: 1 cap = 250 or 500 mg For UTI prophylaxis (prevention) DOSE: 12.5 mg/kg at night Open 1 (250) caps and dilute powder with 5 cc of water ! 1 cc = 50 mg
DESCRIPTION_EN:
Antibiotic for bacterial infections: skin and soft tissue infections, urine tract infections,
 urine tract infections prophylaxis (prevention), pneumonia.
 1st choice antibiotic for not-compicated Urinary Tract Infections.
NOTE_EN:
- For simple UTI (lower UTI) give for 3 days. 
 - In pregnancy give for 7 days.
 - For complicated UTI (pyelonephritis) give for 7-10 days.
FOOD_EN: Can be taken with food or without food.
BE_CAREFUL_EN:
- Patients with epilepsy: high levels can increase risk of seizures.
 - Patients with kidney disease: decrease dose if kidney functions is 
 not normal.
 - Patients who had a rash or oedema after using Amoxicillin or 
 Penicillin.
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: If history of severe rash using Ceftriaxone
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Rash, headache, feeling sick (nausea, diarrhoea, stomach pain).
INTERACTIONS_EN: Zinc can decrease absorption of Cefalexin. Do not give together
BE_CAREFUL_KA:
- ၦၤဆါလၢအအိၣ်ဒီးတၢ်ထီၣ်ထိးပျုၢ်တၢ်ဆါ။
 - ကသံၣ်အဂံၢ်မ့ၢ်ဆူၣ်န့ၣ်မၤဘၣ်ဒိ၀ဲၦၤလၢအအိၣ်ဒီးတၢ်ထီၣ်တၢ်ဆါတဖၣ်။
 - ၦၤလၢအိၣ်ဒီးကလ့ၢ်တၢ်ဆါဟ့ၣ်လီၤစှၤကသံၣ်ဒိးစ်ဖဲအကလ့ၢ်တမၤတၢ်ဂ့ၤ
 ဂ့ၤဘၣ်တက့ၢ်။
 - ၦၤဆါလၢမ့ၢ်အီ၀ဲကသံၣ (Amoxicillin) မ့ (Penicillin) တဖၣ်အံၤ၀ံၤန့ၣ်
 အလိၤဖှိၣ်ထီၣ်မ့တမ့ၢ်ကဘု။
DO_NOT_GIVE_KA: ၦၤလၢအီ၀ဲကသံၣ (Ceftriaxone) အံၤဒီးအလိၤထီၣ်နးနးကလဲာ် တဖၣ်။
INTERACTIONS_KA:
ကသံၣ (Zinc) န့ၣ်မၤလီၤစၢ်၀ (Cefalexin) အသဟီၣ်လီၤ။
 တဘၣ်ဟ့ၣ်ဃုာ်တဂ့ၤ။

DESCRIPTION_EN:
Anti-allergic which does not make people too sleepy.
 For urticaria and allergic reactions (does not treat the cause, only the symptoms)
FOOD_EN: Can be taken with or without food
BE_CAREFUL_EN:
Old people, people with liver and kidney diseases, epilepsy, people who
 drink alcohol, people who work with machinery or driving.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN: Headache (especially in children), drowsiness, abdominal pain.

DESCRIPTION_EN: To treat high blood pressure, heart failure. If possible, ask a doctor for advice.
NOTE_EN:
Can be given in combination with Amlodipine and
 Hydrochlorothiazide.
FOOD_EN: Can take with or without food.
BE_CAREFUL_EN: If possible, avoid using in people with kidney problems
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN: Together with Spironolactone (there is risk of high Potassium).
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN:
Blood Pressure can decrease too much, kidney problems, dry 
 cough, high Potassium.
INTERACTIONS_EN:
- Aluminium decreases absorption of Enalapril.
 - Alcohol, Atenonolol, Hydrochlorothiazide, Furosemide increase
 effect.
NOTE_KA: ဟ့ၣ်ဃုာ်ဒီးကသံၣ်ပာ်ဖှိၣ်ဃုာ် (Amlodipine) ဒီး (Hydrochlorothiazide)သ့။
DO_NOT_GIVE_KA: ဟ့ၣ်ဃုာ်ဒီး (Spironolactone) တၢ်ဘၣ်ယိၣ်အိၣ်လၢ (Potassium)ကအါထီၣ်ဒိၣ်တလၢန့ၣ်လီၤ။
SIDE_EFFECTS_KA: သွံၣ်အတၢ်ဆီၣ်သနံးကလီၤစှၤဒိၣ်တလၢ၊ ကလ့ၢ်တၢ်ကီတၢ်ခဲ၊ကိး ဃ့ထီ၊ (Potassium) အါထီၣ်။
INTERACTIONS_KA: - (Aluminium) ထုးလီၤစှၤကသံၣ (Enalapril) အသဟီၣ်။ - (Alcohol, Atenonolol, Hydrochlorothiazide, Furosemide) မၤအါထီၣ်ကသံၣ် (Enalapril) အသဟီၣ်။

DESCRIPTION_EN: Anti-depressant, generalised anxiety disorder and panic disorder.
NOTE_EN:
- To stop therapy, reduce slowly by 10 mg every 2 - 4 weeks.
 - Patients may have more anxiety for the first 2 - 3 weeks after starting
 the medication.
FOOD_EN: Can be taken with food or without food.
BE_CAREFUL_EN:
- Heart disease, diabetes, epilepsy, gastro-intestinal bleeding.
 - In young adult can cause suicidal thinking.
 - Patients should not drive or operating machinery.
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN:
- With Amitryptiline; with Tramadol.
 - To patients with not controlled epilepsy
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN:
- Diarrhoea, abdominal pain, nausea, constipation, gastric pain,
 anxiety, convulsions, drowsiness, dizziness, dry mouth, dry eyes, 
 headache, increased sweating, decreased libido.
 - RARE SYNDROME: tremor, rigidity, tachycadia, high or low blood
 pressure, diarrhoea, shivering, high temperature, agitation, confusion
INTERACTIONS_EN:
- Alcohol: more risk of feeling sleepy.
 - Carbamazepine, Phenobarbitone, Phenytoin: reduce effect of 
 Fluoxetine.
 - Fluoxetine decreases effect of Carbamazepine, 
 Phenobarbitone, Phenytoin.
DO_NOT_GIVE_KA:
- ဃုာ်ဒီး(Amitryptiline)။ ဃုာ်ဒီး(Tramadol)။
 - လၢၦၤဆါလၢအပၢၤဃာ်တၢ်ထီၣ်ထိးပျုၢ်တၢ်ဆါတန့ၢ်ဘၣ်တဖၣ်အအိၣ်တဂ့ၤ။
INTERACTIONS_KA:
- တၢ်မူၤတၢ်ဘှီး=မၤလီၤမံခ့ကထုတၢ်အါထီၣ်။ - (Carbamazepine, Phenobarbitone, Phenytoin) မၤလီၤစှၤ (Fluoxetine) အသဟီၣ်။ - (Fluoxetine)မၤလီၤစှၤ (Carbamazepine, Phenobarbitone,
 Phenytoin)အသဟီၣ်။

DOSAGE_KA: ၁ ပလီ = ၂ ခခ = ၈၀ mg
DESCRIPTION_EN:
Antibiotic to use together with ampicillin for severe bacterial infections:
 meningitis, sepsis, severe pneumonia, severe kidney infections, severe biliary-tract
 infections, severe trauma.
DESCRIPTION_KA:
ကသံၣ်မၤသံ (ဘၣ်ထံ&ံယၤ) ဃၢ်သူဃုာ်ဒီး (Ampicillin) လၢ (ဘၣ်ထံ&ံယၤ) ဃၢ်နုာ်လၢအနး၊
 လၢခိၣ်နူာ်သလီ၊ လၢသွံၣ်ကျါ၊ လၢပသိၣ်လၢအနး၊ လၢကလ့ၢ်လၢအနး၊ လၢသဒံကျိၤလၢအနး၊
 တၢ်ဘၣ်ဒိဘၣ်ထံးလၢအနး။
NOTE_EN:
- If possible, calculate the dose by weight.
 - Can use Ceftriaxone instead of Ampicillin+Gentamicin.
 - Max duration 7 days.
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN:
If possible, do not give with Furosemide. If you have to, give
 one drug in the morning and the other one in the evening.
PREGANCY_EN: If possible avoid and use Ceftriaxone.
NOTE_KA:
- မ့ၢ်သ့န့ၣ်ကဘၣ်ဒွး(ဒိးစ်) လၢၦၤဆါအကံလိအဖီခိၣ်။
 - နသူကသံၣ် (Ceftriaxone) လၢ(Ampicillin+Gentamicin) အခၢၣ်စးသ့။
 - ဟ့ၣ်အါကတၢၢ်၇သီ။
DO_NOT_GIVE_KA:
မ့ၢ်သ့တဘၣ်ဟ့ၣ်ဃုာ်ဒီး (Furosemide) ဘၣ်။ မၢ့်လိၣ်နီၢ်နီၢ်ဒီးဟ့ၣ်တမၠိ
 လၢဂီၤခီဒီးအဂၤတမၠိလၢဟါခီ။
PREGANCY_KA: မ့ၢ်သ့ဟးဆှဲးဒီးသ (Ceftriaxone) တက့ၢ်။

DESCRIPTION_EN: To treat pain, inflammation, fever with discomfort in children.
NOTE_EN:
People’s bodies react in different ways to anti-inflammatories: one medicine 
 can be good for one person but not for another. 
  For example: one person can improve with Ibuprofen but not with Diclofenac; 
  another can improve with Diclofenac but not with Ibuprofen; another can 
  improve with Indomethacin and not with Diclofenac, etc. This means that if a 
  person does not get better with one, you can try another one and then 
  another one. Anti-inflammatories found in different clinics: Aspirin, Diclofenac, 
  Ibuprofen, Indomethacin, Ketoprofen, Meloxicam, Naproxen.
FOOD_EN: Take with food or milk to avoid gastric upset
BE_CAREFUL_EN: Old people, kidney problems, asthma, heart problems.
DO_NOT_GIVE_EN:
Peptic ulcer (new and old); Dengue fever, together with Aspirin, 
 allergy to Aspirin, kidney failure, severe heart failure, severe liver 
 disease.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN:
Stomach pain,peptic ulcers, kidney damage, rash, headache, 
 dizziness, hearing problems; kidney failure.
INTERACTIONS_EN:
- Ciprofloxacin and Norfloxacin: more risk of convulsions.
 - Dexamethasone and Prednisolone (corticosteroid group): more risk 
 of stomach bleeding.
 - Furosemide and Hydrochlothiazide: more risk of kidney damage.
 - Ibuprofen increases effects of Phenytoin.
 - Ibuprofen decreases effects of Atenolol and Propanolol.
NOTE_KA:
ၦၤကညီမိၢ်ၦၢ်န့ၣ်အံၤမၤဆၢ၀ဲကသံၣ်မၤဘျါတၢ်ညီးအံၤလၢကျဲအါဘိလီၤ။ကသံၣ်တခါန့ၣ်
 ကဂ့ၤ၀ဲလၢၦၤတဂၤအဂီၢ်ဘၣ်ဆၣ်တဂ့ၤလၢၦၤအဂၤတဂၤအဂီၢ်သ့၀ဲလီၤ။ အဒိ=ၦၤတဂၤန့ၣ်အီၣ်၀ဲကသံၣ (Ibuprofen) ဒီးကိညၢ်လီၤ၀ဲဘၣ်ဆၣ်အီၣ်၀ဲ (Diclofenac) တကိညၢ်လီၤဘၣ်။ ၦၤအဂၤတဂၤန့ၣ်အီၣ်၀ဲ (Diclofenac) ဒီးကိညၢ်လီၤဘၣ်ဆၣ်မ့ၢ်အီၣ် (Ibuprofen) န့ၣ်တကိညၢ်လီၤဘၣ်။
 ၦၤအဂၤတဂၤန့ၣ်အီၣ်၀ဲ (Indomethacin) ဒီးကိညၢ်လီၤဘၣ်ဆၣ်မ့ၢ်အီၣ် (Diclofenac) န့ၣ်တကိညၢ်လီၤဘၣ်။ လၢတၢ်န့ၣ်၊အဃိၦၤတဂၤအံၤအီၣ်၀ဲ
 ကသံၣ်အံၤ မ့ၢ်တကိညၢ်လီၤဘၣ်ဒီဟ့ၣ်အီၤကသံၣ်အဂၤတခါ၀ံၤအဂၤတခါတက့ၢ်။
 တၢ်မၤဘျါတၢ်ညီးအကသံၣ်လၢအိၣ်၀ဲဒၣ်လၢကသံၣ်ဒၢးတဖၣ်= (Aspirin)၊
 (Diclofenac)၊(Ibuprofen)၊(Indomethacin)၊ (Ketoprofen)၊ (Meloxicam)၊
 Naproxen။
DO_NOT_GIVE_KA: ကဖုတၢ်ဆါ(အသီဒီးလီၢ်လံၤ)၊ ဒဲကံၢ်တိၤကွ့၊ တဘၣ်ဟ့ၣ်ဃုာ်ဒီး (Aspirin) တဂ့ၤ၊ၦၤလၢအတဖီးဒီး (Aspirin)၊ ကလ့ၢ်တမၤတၢ်မၤဘၣ်၊သးဖျၢၣ်တမၤတၢ်မၤဘၣ်အ နး၊ သူၣ်တၢ်ဆါလၢအနးနၣ့်လီၤ။
INTERACTIONS_KA: -(Ciprofloxacin)ဒီး(Norfloxacin)-တၢ်ဘၣ်ယိၣ်အါထီၣ်လၢတၢ်ထီၣ်တၢ်ဆါအဂီၢ်။ - (Dexamethasone)ဒီး(Prednisolone)-တၢ်လီၤဘၣ်ယိၣ်အါထီၣ်လၢကဖုသွံၣ်ယွၤဂီၢ။ - (Furosemide)ဒီး (Hydrochlothiazide) တၢ်လီၤဘၣ်ယိၣ်အါထီၣ်လၢကလ့ၢ်ဟးဂီၤသ့။ - (Ibuprofen) မၤအါထီၣ်ကသံၣ (Phenytoin) အသဟီၣ်လီၤ။ - (Ibuprofen) ထုးလီၤစှၤ (Atenolol) ဒီး (Propanolol) အသဟီၣ်လီၤ။

DOSAGE_KA: ၁ ပလီ ၁% = ၁ cc = ၁၀ mg ၁ ပလီ ၂% = ၁ cc = ၂၀ mg
BE_CAREFUL_EN: Epilepsy, severe shock, liver and kidney problems, pregnancy.
PREGANCY_EN: Can give (but careful with high doses in last 3 months).

DESCRIPTION_EN:
Anti-worm (roundworms, hookworms, pinworms).
 NOT effective for FLAT WORMS.
FOOD_EN:
- Can be taken with food or without food.
 - Tablets can be crushed and mixed with food.
 - Tablets can be chewed or swallowed whole.
PREGANCY_KA: တဘၣ်ဟၣ့်ၦၤမိၢ်ဒၢလၢအဒၢထီၣ်သီသၢလါအတီၢ်ပူၤတဂ့ၤ။

DESCRIPTION_EN: For severe allergic reaction, asthma, Nephrotic Syndrome, Rheumatic Fever.
DESCRIPTION_KA: တၢ်ဆါလၢဟဲကဲထီၣ်သးဒီးဂာ်တဖီးတၢ်ဒိဆၢက့ၤတၢ်လၢအနး၊ တၢ်သးဘံး၊ ကလ့ၢ်တၢ်ဆါ (Nephrotic Syndrome) ဒီး(&ူၢ်မဲၣ်တံၣ်)တၢ်ကိၢ်ထီၣ်။
NOTE_EN:
- Better to take it in the morning in a single dose after breakfast.
 - Give Albendazole to prevent worm spread.
 - Be sure patient does not have TB if giving long course (can make it worse).
 - Do not stop suddenly if given for more than 3 weeks, but decrease slowly.
FOOD_EN: Take with food or milk or after meal to decrease gastric upset.
BE_CAREFUL_EN:
Hypertension, heart failure, liver and kidney disease, diabetes, 
 osteoporosis, glaucoma, epilepsy, peptic ulcer, hypothyroidism.
SIDE_EFFECTS_EN:
In chronic use: 
 Diabetes, osteoporosis, gastric upset, increased severity of
 infections, candida, epilepsy, glaucoma, cataract, muscle 
 weakness, bone fracture, tendon rupture, increased weight, 
 irregular periods.
INTERACTIONS_EN:
- NSAID (Ibuprofen, Indomethacin) and Aspirin: more risk of
 ` bleeding from stomach and bowel.
 - Prednisolone reduces effect of Anti-diabetics, Atenolol,
 Propranolol, Furosemide, Hydochlorothiazide and Methyldopa
PREGANCY_EN:
Can give max 40 mg OD for short courses
 (up to 5 days).
BREAST_FEEDING_EN:
Can give max 40 mg OD for short courses
 (up to 5 days).
INTERACTIONS_KA:
- NSAID (Ibuprofen)၊ (Indomethacin) ဒီး (Aspirin) -ဟ့ၣ်ဂံၢ်ဟ့ၣ်ဘါသွံၣ်ယွၤလၢကဖုဒီးၦံၤဖိသ့ၣ်တဖၣ်နၣ့်လီၤ။ - (Prednisolone)မၤလီၤစှၤကသံၣ် .f (Anti-diabetics)၊ (Atenolol)၊
 (Propranolol)၊ (Furosemide)၊ (Hydochlorothiazide)ဒီး (Methyldopa) အသဟီၣ်နၣ့်လီၤ။
